channel.title: Devolution question: Repost
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm not familiar with Devo, and I'm starting one. I cant find any method to add Objects, and I tried objects.cfg.
Does anyone know how to do this? Gladly appreciated, -Tony.

item.title: Devolution question: Repost
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] public void delObj(int objectX, int objectY) {
ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10);
}

public void newObj(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation) {
	for (Player p : Server.PlayerManager.players) {
		if (p != null) {
			Client person = (Client) p;

			if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) {
				if (person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60) {
					person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, 10);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

public void loadObjects() {  
	newObj(x, y, id, face);
	delObj(x, y);
}[/code]

case 121: loadObjects(); break;

Read full topic
